description:
A compact lock to protect your bike in low risk areas. Folding locks are a nice alternative to bulky U-locks and heavy chains. Offering more protection than a cable lock, the Switch folding lock is easy to bring along. With a bike mounting bracket and a clip system, you can put your lock on your bike, or on your hip.

  • Rated Bronze level protection by Sold Secure – an independent 3rd party lock testing group. This means the lock is good for quick stops in high traffic areas
  • 6 hardened steel bars with premium steel rivets create a very strong linkage
  • 85cm lock opening leaves plenty of room for you bike and what you’re locking it to
  • Silicone sleeve on the bars protects your bike’s paint
  • Folded dimensions 19 x 4cm
  • Included mount fits standard water bottle mounts or can be clipped to your belt, a pack strap, etc
  • 3 coded keys are included
name: Hiplok Switch Folding Lock
